up: CREATE TABLE 'migrations' ('id' INT(11) NOT NULL, 'name' VARCHAR(1024) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT 'unique_name' UNIQUE ('name'), PRIMARY KEY ('id') );
CREATE TABLE 'users' ('id' INT(11) NOT NULL, 'username' VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 'password' VARCHAR(1024) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT 'unique_username' UNIQUE ('username'), PRIMARY KEY ('id'));
